title: Sold: N173 Old Judge Cabinet Checklist
author: Kris19

posts.post_title: Sold: N173 Old Judge Cabinet Checklist
posts.post_content:
1889 Goodwin & Co. printed checklist of Old Judge cabinet cards (now designated N173).  Measures 2 3/4" x 5 1/2".  Wear/tears along the fold lines as it originally came in small packages of cigarettes.  Great companion piece!

Sold, net to me, delivered.

Please PM or email [url]kris.sweckard@sbcglobal.net[/url] to purchase or with any questions. Thanks!
